0.text: Bug 21958  ControlExample FileDialog does not filter correctly.

1.text: The FileDialog created in the Dialog tab has extensions and filter names set  but these are not working correctly.

2.text: Delete the entry in File name field Set the filter to Doc files and go to a folder with *.doc files.

3.text: You will see  the folders but not the files.

4.text: Same is true for all the other filters.

5.text: I set the file name field to "*.doc" then I see the doc files.

6.text: I noted that  this occurs even if the file extension field is set to something else such as  Batch Files.

7.text: I noted that the extension for .txt has an extra period after ie (".txt.")

8.text: but  removing this still does not fix the dialog behaviour.

9.text: I also noted that on GTK and Motif the filters do not seem to apply at all.

10.text: It  should be noted in the javadoc for FileDialog.setFilterExtensions etc that  these filters are not applied on all platforms.
